DOC.HEADLINE: PALM SPRINGS FILM FEST DEADLINE NOV . 30
DOC.TEXT: Entries are being accepted for the 1995 Palm Springs International Film Festival . Videocassettes , scripts and draft outlines must be submitted by Nov . 30 to Mark Diamond , Palm Springs Film Festival , P.O. Box 2230 , Palm Springs , Calif . 92263 . Information : ( 619 ) 322-2930 .
